value:
I saw a lovely sunset the other day.$k$pEven though I've been summoned to
a different world, nature continues to
astound me with its beauty.

People continue to fight and kill each
other, no matter the world, or the era.
Yet, still... I find myself...

I don't really like crowds. Sometimes,
I sneak off to the forest to catch a
break.$k$pI'm guessing the guiding hand of this
army might need a break, too!

I found some delicious-looking fruit
while I was strolling around the
castle grounds. Want some?

I was thinking... While I'm here, I can
be my true self. Here, my past has no
hold on me.$k$pAnd when I think that... I can't help but
wish that I could stay here forever.

Hello. I'm Micaiah. I'm on a visit from
$Nf's place.

Goddess Ashunera, I thank you
for your guidance.

I've got to work harder. Everyone
is counting on me.

This is a trial willed by the
goddess. I'll overcome it.

I can use this power to help end
all the sorrow fighting brings.

I'm Micaiah. The townspeople call me
the Silver-Haired Maiden. I'm pleased
to meet you!

You know, you're kind and thoughtful,
$Nu.$k$pMy brother and I live apart, now...but
the way you worry about me reminds
me of him.$k$pIt's strange to feel this way, yet it's
also intensely familiar...$k$pThe skies that separate me from my
brother are vast. But I'm starting to
think of you as family, too.$k$pStill, there's something I haven't been
able to tell you yet—something about
myself.$k$pEven now, I can't reveal everything
about myself or my powers. $k$pSomeday, though... I'm certain I'll be
able to tell you everything.
ええいっ！
だめ！
きゃああっ！
This pain's nothing...
I have no choice!
If this means survival...
I have to fight!
Such cowardly tactics.
Daein will forgive me.
ふふっ
I'm Micaiah. I'm just a...fortune teller...
Eek! W-wait, Yune! Hold still!
I can tell what people are thinking, you know. Right now you were thinking about how jealous you are!
Sometimes I get very frightened. I can't think what I'd do if I lost you. It feels like my heart would rip apart.
I believe in you. You have a pure heart.
The visions I see spreading out before us... We're meeting others and forming bonds... And we're fighting side by side.
Promise me that we'll both live through this.
Yes?
What should I do?
Let's move.
